p: 118/300 (37.5%) MSM/TG were HIV-positive and 182/300 were HIV-negative. One seed participant refused HIV testing. Mean age was 26 years, though HIV-positive MSM/TG were older on average than those HIV-negative, Table 1. The majority were born in Johannesburg, had completed secondary education, were Black African, unemployed, Christian and unmarried. While most MSM/TG identified as cisgender male, a substantial minority were transfeminine (15.7% among those HIV-positive and 11.7% among those HIV-negative). HIV-negative MSM/TG more often identified as bisexual, heterosexual or other compared to HIV-positive MSM/TG (40.5% compared to 11.9%).
